document.heading: Motor Vehicle Fees Amendment Temporary Act of 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-153, the “Motor Vehicle Fees Amendment Temporary Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-591. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 29, 1990, and June 12, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 13, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-213 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
